testcase.name: Enter Travel Details
testcase.system-out: Given Home Page should be open..............................................passed When Page Title is Goibibo-XXX..............................................passed Then Maximize the window....................................................passed Then Source is entered......................................................passed And destination is entered..................................................passed And Booking Date Details are selected.......................................passed And Search button is clicked................................................passed Then Flight details page should get opened..................................passed And Flight Search should be sorted by Highest price.........................passed Then Click on first Book Button.............................................passed Then Add Travel Protection..................................................passed Then Enter the details of Traveller.........................................passed And Click on Proceed........................................................passed Then Select the wallet option for payment...................................passed Then Browser should be closed...............................................passed
